title: NVIDIA Riva Triton Inference Server Missing Authentication Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to access protected functionality on affected installations of NVIDIA Riva. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the configuration of the Triton Inference Server. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to access the Triton Inference Server API on the target system.
addtionnal_details: NVIDIA has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5625
timeline:
2024-11-15 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-03-13 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-03-13 - Advisory Updated
credit: David Fiser and Alfredo Oliveira ( Nebula of Trend Micro )
